createBookingTable: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS supplier_bookings (booking_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, check_in_date DATETIME, check_out_date DATETIME, hotel_name VARCHAR(50), no_of_guests INTEGER, status VARCHAR(10), booking_reference VARCHAR(50), created_on DATETIME, updated_on DATETIME, PRIMARY KEY ( booking_reference ))
insertBooking: INSERT INTO supplier_bookings(booking_id, check_in_date, check_out_date, hotel_name, no_of_guests, status, booking_reference, created_on, updated_on) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
updateBooking: UPDATE supplier_bookings SET check_in_date = ?, check_out_date = ?, status = ?, updated_on = ? WHERE booking_reference = ?
